bibl.title: A Mithraic Catechism from Egypt <P. Berol. 21196>
bibl.note: Hermupolis, IVth century A.D. - Pp. 52-57: Mithras in Egypt. - Pp. 58-68: Appendix. Belts in Initiation Rites. - The Iconographical Evidence.
bibl.seg: BRASHEAR William M., A Mithraic Catechism from Egypt <P. Berol. 21196>. (Tyche. Supplementband.)
Wien, A. Holzhausen, 1992, 8Â°, 70 pp. et 1 pl. ISBN 3-900518-07-6. 198 sch. autr.
Hermupolis, IVth century A.D. - Pp. 52-57: Mithras in Egypt. - Pp. 58-68: Appendix. Belts in Initiation Rites. - The Iconographical Evidence.

C.R. par Roger Beck, Gnomon 67 (1995) pp. 261-262. - Manfred Clauss, Klio 76 (1994) pp. 523-524. - Sergio Daris, Aegyptus 73 (1993) pp. 286-288 [concerne aussi Idem, Magica varia (Bruxelles, 1991)]. - Fritz Graf, MusHelv 51 (1994) p. 254. - J. Gwyn Griffiths, CR N.S., 44 (1994) pp. 181-182. - Christine Harrauer, ChrEg 68 (1993) Nos 135-136, pp. 280-281. - G.H.R. Horsley, BibO 53 (1996) coll. 723-725. - Luther H. Martin, Numen 41 (1994) pp. 325-326.
